availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Russell County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of George W. Twidwell and Eliza Twidwell. Married to Mariah I. Twidwell. Father of Ida L. Twidwell and Elizabeth Twidwell. Resident in Russell County in 1850. Merchant in Russell County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Russell County, 1st District, p. 225A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, Hustonville, p. 61A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Russell County Marriages, Film# 453, p. 24.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Russell County, KY, February 1864, p. 358, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, "Felix B. Twidwell (1839-1874)," Memorial #82053638, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/82053638 (accessed October 15, 2019).
